thread.title: Beautiful hotel so modern and amazing hospitality
thread.title_full: Beautiful hotel so modern and amazing hospitality - Review of Park Central Hotel New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: dailey2025
title: Beautiful hotel so modern and amazing hospitality
text: Came up for the weekend to celebrate my friends birthday. The hotel is very modern and the decor is amazing. Great check in staff and hospitality from guest services! The texting concierge was so cool and made me feel welcomed and valued making sure we had everything we needed. Convenient! Definitely would stay again.
